content: this pattern is a significant revision of berroco s celestine crochet 1 the points have been modified to be more rounded and the pattern revised to work from the tip of each point to the base you can use either a c d **or** e hook i ve made one with each hook and the difference is size is not appreciable so use whichever hook you have handy i put cat toys in the dodecahedron so it makes noise when it is shaken i found the most effective noise makers were cat toys namely **beaded buzz balls** and **lattice bell balls** 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/celestine-crochet
